name: Cross X Blast
description:
Survive as long as you can! Gather resources and deliver them to the airship and spend them on upgrades to strengthen the player character and airship.

WASD - Move around
Click - Shoot

E - Signal airship to pick up player and deposit resources

F - Harvest resources

Escape - Pause Menu



This game was created for the 2022 Epic Megajam.

Brought to you by the Afterhours Club.
